haikus.text:
In candles' golden glow
Flames dance as lightning strikes
As night falls on this scene
lines: As night falls on this scene

haikus.text:
Infinite warmth spreads
Through branches of blooming trees
Their leaves tipped by moon's glow
lines: Their leaves tipped by moon's glow

haikus.text:
The soft light of my candles
Shadows dance on their edges
As they sing to me from afar
lines: The soft light of my candles
As they sing to me from afar
